title: Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 15 SSC Executive Posts
description: The Indian Navy Recruitment has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 15 SSC Executive Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Computer Science Engineering, 10th pass, 12th, B.Sc, M.Sc, can apply for the Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
